title: Unlucky1234
author: Unlucky1234
content: Hi, we are looking to add crypto deposit and withdrawals to our project we are working on.We would love to pay someone for guidance on how to develop our own hot and cold wallet deposit/withdrawal system.We are aware of services like coinpayments, coinspaid etc but we don't want to trust a third party service with funds.PM or drop your telegram or discord ID below and I will message you.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Unlucky1234 on January 06, 2023, 06:01:37 PMHi, we are looking to add crypto deposit and withdrawals to our project we are working on.We would love to pay someone for guidance on how to develop our own hot and cold wallet deposit/withdrawal system.We are aware of services like coinpayments, coinspaid etc but we don't want to trust a third party service with funds.PM or drop your telegram or discord ID below and I will message you. I think hiring a professional to manage the job is a good idea, but if you already have a capable developer, there are some free or open-source solutions that can get you started, like for example Poof https://www.poof.io/ and BTCPay Server https://btcpayserver.org/. The main benefit of using an open-source solution, like BTCPay Server, is that they are not cloud-based and do not require any third party for the integration. It means that the entire process is under your control, and you don't have to worry about security issues or data privacy.
